column4: something is this part was not happy with: command="/home/someuser/rsync/checkrsync",from="mirror.example.com",no-port-forwarding,no-X11-forwarding,no-pty but just when running rsync
Picl obviously the no-pty was why i could not ssh, but it should of worked when I rsynced
ok time for a stupid question, if I add a use to the root group should he be able to read everything on that server?
not entirely, if all files are 700 in a dir, no, as group does not have privilege then.
